abstract: The proposed union of Kinder Morgan and the El Paso Corporation would add crucial infrastructure to the natural gas sector. So crucial, it may face antitrust obstacles.
snippet: The proposed union of Kinder Morgan and the El Paso Corporation would add crucial infrastructure to the natural gas sector. So crucial, it may face antitrust obstacles.
lead_paragraph: Kinder Morgan’s planned $21.1 billion takeover of the El Paso Corporation is seen as a potential catalyst for consolidation in an unheralded but increasingly important part of the energy industry: the companies whose pipes carry the oil and gas.

headline.main: A Pipeline Merger Meets a Need, and Perhaps Resistance

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Clifford Krauss

abstract: An extravagant 27-story house built in Mumbai by India’s richest man, Mukesh Ambani, has been completed, but the owners apparently have not moved in — raising questions as to why.
snippet: An extravagant 27-story house built in Mumbai by India’s richest man, Mukesh Ambani, has been completed, but the owners apparently have not moved in — raising questions as to why.
lead_paragraph: MUMBAI, India — When India’s richest man completed his extravagant 27-story new house here last year, it incited a public debate along the lines of “What’s he trying to prove?”

headline.main: For Wealthy Indian Family, Palatial House Is Not a Home
headline.print_headline: For Wealthy Indian Family, Palatial House Is Not a Home

abstract: “Secret Millionaires Club” is holding meetings again, and Warren E. Buffett tells DealBook about his financial advice for kids and why he is getting help from the rapper Jay-Z.
snippet: “Secret Millionaires Club” is holding meetings again, and Warren E. Buffett tells DealBook about his financial advice for kids and why he is getting help from the rapper Jay-Z.
lead_paragraph: He may never reach the heights of Dora the Explorer or SpongeBob SquarePants, but Warren E. Buffett is back in 2D. And this time he gets some help from the rapper Jay-Z.

headline.main: Buffett Returns to Cartoonland, Joined by Jay-Z

abstract: Market influences should be putting wind in deal makers’ sails, but the Deal Professor says the overall trend is that of M.&A. rushing toward a cliff.
snippet: Market influences should be putting wind in deal makers’ sails, but the Deal Professor says the overall trend is that of M.&A. rushing toward a cliff.
lead_paragraph: The merger market is like a pack of lemmings. If the economy is good , the takeover market will follow, but when times are bad, the market stalls.

headline.main: As Economy Goes, So Go Takeovers, Even as Bargains Abound
